name: Ki-rin

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
descriptions: The ki-rin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). The ki-rin can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

descriptions.raw: At will: gaseous form, major image (6th-level version), wind walk
descriptions.hyperlinked: At will: gaseous form, major image (6th-level version), wind walk

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day).
descriptions: If the ki-rin fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
descriptions: The ki-rin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons.
descriptions: The ki-rin's weapon attacks are magical.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The ki-rin is a 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): light, mending, sacred flame, spare the dying, thaumaturgy
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): light, mending, sacred flame, spare the dying, thaumaturgy

descriptions.raw: 1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, detect evil and good, protection from evil and good, sanctuary
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, detect evil and good, protection from evil and good, sanctuary

descriptions.raw: 2nd level (3 slots): calm emotions, lesser restoration, silence
descriptions.hyperlinked: 2nd level (3 slots): calm emotions, lesser restoration, silence

descriptions.raw: 3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, remove curse, sending
descriptions.hyperlinked: 3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, remove curse, sending

descriptions.raw: 4th level (3 slots): banishment, freedom of movement, guardian of faith
descriptions.hyperlinked: 4th level (3 slots): banishment, freedom of movement, guardian of faith

descriptions.raw: 5th level (3 slots): greater restoration, mass cure wounds, scrying
descriptions.hyperlinked: 5th level (3 slots): greater restoration, mass cure wounds, scrying

descriptions.raw: 6th level (1 slot): heroes' feast, true seeing
descriptions.hyperlinked: 6th level (1 slot): heroes' feast, true seeing

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The ki-rin makes three attacks: two with its hooves and one with its horn.

actions.name: Hoof.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 15 ft, one target. Hit: 10 (2d4+5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Horn.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8+5) piercing damage.

legendary_action_description: The ki-rin can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The ki-rin regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Detect.
descriptions: The ki-rin makes a Wisdom (Perception) check or a Wisdom (Insight) check.

legendary_actions.name: Smite.
descriptions: The ki-rin makes a hoof attack or casts sacred flame.

legendary_actions.name: Move.
descriptions: The ki-rin moves up to its half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
